articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kong Jin Thae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Kong Jin Thae
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Kong Jin Thae, member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and former vice-premier of the Administration Council, on Wednesday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Japan's Forcible Drafting of Koreans and Slave Labor Imposed upon Them Blasted
articles.content:
Japan's Forcible Drafting of Koreans and Slave Labor Imposed upon Them Blasted
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Committee on Measures for Compensation to Former Korean "Comfort Women" for Japanese Army and Victims of Forcible Drafting on August 20 released a survey report in connection with the recent finding of the Koreans who had been forced to do slave labor after being forcibly taken to the Kobe Shipbuilding Yard of the Japanese Mitsubishi Heavy Industries Co., Ltd (at that time).
					The report referred to the above-said crimes committed by the government of Imperial Japan and the shipbuilding yard confirmed on the basis of the testimonies made by the victims and the results of the investigation made into the crimes.
					
					According to the report, about 1,550 spots have been confirmed so far to be sites where Koreans were forced to do slave labor at that time.
					
					 The report went on:
					
					The number of the Koreans who were forcibly drafted to the coal and ore mines under the above-said company is estimated to be about 60,000. That might reach more than 100,000, when those Koreans who were forced to toil and moil in the fields of heavy industry and other fields are added to it.
					
					At least 4,000 young and middle-aged Koreans were forcibly taken to the Kobe Shipbuilding Yard in two batches from Phyongan and Kyongsang and other provinces. Just hundreds of persons out of more than 2,000 Koreans who had been taken there from Phyongan Province could be able to return home as the rest met deaths due to unbearable forced labor, various kinds of accidents and air raids by the U.S. force, etc. 
					
					Physical and mental coercive methods were employed by the Japanese imperialists to forcibly draft young and middle-aged Koreans to Japan. They included abduction and allurement and coercion by government and military powers.
					
					They forced Koreans to do hard labor and mediaeval slavery for unlimited hours under the worst working conditions after detaining them in places similar to concentration camps. 
					
					The imperial Japanese government and its accomplice the big Japanese business bodies were the main culprits of forcible drafting and forced labor, the report noted, and continued:
					
					This can be explained by the following facts:  At that time the big Japanese businesses and management bodies requested the government to work out and implement the policy for forcibly drafting Koreans. 
					
					It was these big businesses and management bodies that perpetrated watch, suppression and discrimination against those young and middle-aged Koreans who had been taken to Japan and other parts of Asia. 
					
					After the defeat of Japan, the above-said big businesses have not paid at all to the victims and the bereaved families of the dead what they failed to do. 
					
					They burnt up and concealed evidence and other things proving the forcible drafting and took no measure to settle the issue of the remains of the dead Koreans in different parts of Japan. 
					
					The crimes related to the forcible drafting of Koreans and forced labor imposed upon them committed by the imperial Japanese government and military in collusion with big business bodies and mass killings of them were hideous human rights abuses in violation of not only international law but the domestic law of Japan. That is why the statute of limitations is not applicable to these crimes.
					
					The Japanese government and big businesses should thoroughly probe the truth about the forcible drafting of Koreans and forced labor imposed upon them in the past and open it to the public and make full apology and reparation for them to the victims and the bereaved families of the dead, keenly aware that they can never evade the responsibility for those and other crimes against humanity.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Morocco
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Morocco
Pyongyang August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Mohamed VI, King of Morocco, on his 46th birthday.
					Kim in the message wished the king good health and happiness and the friendly Moroccan people progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Hungary
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Hungary
Pyongyang August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Laszlo Solyom, President of the Republic of Hungary, on the occasion of its national day.
					Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Meetings were separately held by workers and trade union members and agricultural workers in the plaza of the Party Founding Memorial Tower and Sinam-ri, Ryongchon County of North Phyongan Province on Thursday to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					Present there were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, leading officials of working people's organizations, officials of the trade union and the union of agricultural workers and working people.
					
					Reports were delivered there to be followed by speeches.
					
					The reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Il provided guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, Juche 49 (1960), marking the beginning of the glorious history of inheriting President Kim Il Sung's Songun idea and leadership and ushering in an era of a new turning point in developing the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK and accomplishing the cause of Juche.
					
					They referred to the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il in developing the KPA into the invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and firmly defending the country, the revolution and Korean-style socialism with the might of Songun.
					
					Kim Jong Il has successfully pursued the Songun politics with the KPA as the main force of the revolution and wisely led the drive to develop national economy, they stressed.
					
					They evinced their determination to bring about miracles and innovations in production and construction through a new grand revolutionary march, true to the Party's Songun leadership, and thus contribute to opening the gate to a thriving nation.

articles.title: National Program Contest Held
articles.content:
National Program Contest Held
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) - The 10th national program contest in the educational field took place in Pyongyang between Aug. 18 and 20.
					The students selected at the provincial preliminary contests competed, divided into categories of universities and colleges.
					
					The contest fully displayed the level of education in IT and the developing programs at universities and colleges.
					
					A closing ceremony was held at Kim Il Sung University on Thursday.

articles.title: Fidel Castro's Birthday Marked at DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Fidel Castro's Birthday Marked at DPRK Embassy
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) - A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Cuba on August 14 on the occasion of the 83rd birthday of Fidel Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba.
					Present there on invitation were Jorge Marti Martinez, head of the International Department of the C.C., the CPC, Joaquin Quintas Sola, vice-minister of Revolutionary Armed Forces who is member of the C.C., the CPC, Ana Teresita, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs,  Ramon Ripoll, vice-minister of Trade and Foreign Investment, Alicia Corredera, vice-chairman of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, and other officials of party, government and armed forces organs, social organizations and media institutions.

articles.title: Friendly Ties between DPRK and Ecuadorian Provinces Established
articles.content:
Friendly Ties between DPRK and Ecuadorian Provinces Established
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- An agreement on establishing the provincial relationship of friendship between South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK and Los Rios Province of the Republic of Ecuador was signed on July 23.
					 It was inked by DPRK Ambassador to Peru Ri Mun Gyu and the chief delegate of the Ecuadorian president in Los Rios.

articles.title: Electric Insulator of New Series Developed
articles.content:
Electric Insulator of New Series Developed
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Central Metrology Research Institute of the DPRK has succeeded in developing an electric insulator of a new series with highly insulating efficiency and put its production method on a scientific basis.
					 The new electric insulator is incomparably superior to other ones in electric strength, heat resistance and wet-proofing.
					
					 It has been applied to various kinds of high-voltage motors including high-voltage motor of power station and traction motor of electric locomotive, high-tension transformers and electric generators with the result that the serviceable life of the machines has been extended five times compared with the old ones.
					
					 The production cost of the new electric insulator, made of raw materials rich in the country, is one third of that of other same class insulators. It thus gives great economic profits.

articles.title: Program Conducive to Development of Sports Technique
articles.content:
Program Conducive to Development of Sports Technique
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea has directed much effort to developing sports science based on the IT.
					One of them is the program "Pongae (lightning) 1.0", an integrated reaction check system on motion developed by the Computer Center of Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					This system which makes it possible to estimate quickly and correctly ten indices is being introduced in various sports teams.
					
					The system conducts the integrated reaction check on motion with the real-time statistical analysis processing program instead of former conventional measuring method, thus helping coaches select athletes and judge their training in a scientific way.
					
					 The estimation method is as follows:
					
					 From the moment when athletes put their feet on the reaction check board according to the computer-presented situation, necessary figures are calculated and appear on the screen.
					
					 The better the physical preparation is, the more the frequencies of stamping are the shorter the moment of touching the check board is. 
					
					 By this method, the coaches can judge the physical capability of athletes and find out kinesthesia that cannot be solved through training.
					
					 It can estimate the flexibility, motion speed, ability to adopt determination and inheritance.

articles.title: Strong and Brave Korean Nation
articles.content:
Strong and Brave Korean Nation
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation has been widely known in the world as one with strong and brave disposition from olden times.
					It is well proved by many Korean and foreign historical records which have been handed down up to now.
					
					A historical book of a neighboring country writes that the Puyo people are burly and tall and they with a strong character are brave, prudent and generous and do not invade and plunder others.
					
					It also notes that the Okjo people of Ancient Korea are possessed of brave and upright characters and are skillful in using spears in infantry actions. It appreciates the Jinguk people as those of strong and brave disposition.
					
					Having such courageous and stout disposition, the Koguryo people frustrated the invasion of foreign enemies with hundreds of thousands, millions of troops to defend the country firmly.
					
					Their valor and spirit were inherited by those of Palhae, its successor. The Palhae people used to amuse themselves with horse riding and archery.
					
					The Koryo people also displayed bravery in battles with the foreign invaders as their ancestors did.
					
					There are many anecdotes showing objectively the nation's valor in the days of Ri Dynasty.
					
					The Korean nation could win brilliant victories in the struggle for defending the country for many years as the people, with ardent patriotism and strong anti-aggression spirit, displayed matchless gallantry and strong stamina.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean Saber Rattling under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean Saber Rattling under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group are describing the Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) joint military exercises as "defensive ones" and the like but it is nothing but sophism intended to cover up their aggressive and bellicose nature. UFG is a typical drill for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK as it being staged under the codename which replaced Ulji Focus Lens joint military maneuvers.
					Commenting on this, news analyst of Minju Joson Thursday says:
					
					The war exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean conservative authorities are a blatant challenge to the Korean nation and the peace-loving people of the world. This goes to prove that their scenario to seize the DPRK through surprise preemptive attack has reached a very grave phase.
					
					This also clearly shows once again that "sincere dialogue" and "cooperation" touted by them are nothing but crafty chicanery to mislead the south Korean public and evade their responsibility for having bedeviled the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is a daydream for the U.S. and the Lee group to attack the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					It is the traits of the army and people of the DPRK to retaliate against the aggressors' provocation with a thousand-fold punishment, the commentary notes, warning: 
					
					Should the warmongers at home and abroad make any provocation in the sky, land and seas, they will face decisive and merciless blows.

articles.title: North-targeted Landing Operation Exercise Slammed
articles.content:
North-targeted Landing Operation Exercise Slammed
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the "Special Warfare Command" of the puppet ground force of south Korea staged the so-called "naval intrusion exercise" in the waters of the West Sea of Korea. The troops involved were busy with the drill for intruding into the "enemy" area by rubber boats after parachuting on the waters from an altitude of 300 meters under the signboard of improving the high technique of parachuting on the waters and acquiring the capability to overcome coastal obstacles.  
					Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a signed commentary: This is a very dangerous war exercise as it is aimed at acquiring the capability for perpetrating the massive intrusion into coastal areas of the DPRK and carrying out the landing operation in "contingency." 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					What should not be overlooked is that the exercise was staged in the waters of the West Sea where there is the biggest likelihood of military clashes between the north and the south. It goes without saying that the above-said exercise for naval intrusion is adventurous saber rattling for a new war.
					
					 Since its coming to power, the group of traitors in south Korea has systematically escalated the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					The north-targeted war maneuvers being staged by the puppet warmongers are as foolish as an act of a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.
					
					 Should the warmongers dare preempt an attack on the DPRK, persisting in their moves for a war of aggression against it in a bid to realize their foolish ambition, its army built up by Songun will mete out a decisive and merciless punishment to the provocateurs.

articles.title: Struggle for Independent Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Struggle for Independent Reunification Called for
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on Aug. 15, calling upon all the people to turn out in the struggle for independent reunification.
					The statement said that 64 years have passed after Korea's liberation from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, but the Koreans' historic dream of national reunification has not yet been realized.
					
					The U.S. imperialists set foot on the Korean Peninsula under the guise of liberator to bisect the Korean nation and mercilessly killed many patriots at the point of the bayonet of dictatorship, fostering confrontation between the south and the north, it pointed out.
					
					It charged that Lee Myung Bak and the "Grand National Party" are now cruelly quelling the nation's desire for independent reunification, peace and prosperity and making desperate efforts to enforce the dictatorship by mobilizing all the violent forces including the "National Intelligence Service", prosecution and police.
					
					The statement called upon all the progressive camps to unite under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and vigorously struggle for realizing the historic cause of independent reunification.

articles.title: Anti-"government" Struggle Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"government" Struggle Declared in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification held a meeting in Seoul on August 15, declaring that the youth and students will stand in the van of the struggle to force the "government" of traitors to step down.
					Speakers at the meeting noted that the organization has waged on a full scale the struggle to defend the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and achieve independence, democracy and reunification despite the vicious repression by the Lee Myung Bak "government."
					
					They stated that they would concentrate efforts on turning into an all-people movement the struggle to overthrow the Lee "government" which is engaged in stifling democracy and pursuing the fascist dictatorial rule.
					
					A resolution on the struggle for peace against the U.S. and war and for resignation of Lee Myung Bak was adopted at the meeting. It is high time that the people broke with the Lee "government" which bedeviled the inter-Korean relations with flunkeyist and treacherous policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen, the resolution said, declaring that the youth and students would never pardon the group of traitors.
					
					To sincerely implement the inter-Korean declarations is the only way for defending the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and achieving peace and reunification, it stressed.

articles.title: Korean Exhibition Opened in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Exhibition Opened in Russia
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was opened in Russia on August 12 on the occasions of the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership and the 61st birthday of the DPRK.
					 Displayed in the venue were works of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and photos and books on their immortal exploits.
					
					Attending the opening ceremony were personages of different circles, including the mayor and the deputy mayor of the Partizansk City, and popular masses of Russia.
					
					 Addressing the ceremony, the mayor spoke highly of the signal achievements made by the Korean people in building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 And he vowed to strive for boosting the friendly relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed
Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia held a function on August 13 to commemorate the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership and the 64th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					Ro Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the confederation, said in his report at the function for commemorating the 49th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership that he started his Songun revolutionary leadership at the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, providing a sure guarantee for carrying forward the history and tradition of the revolutionary cause of Songun in the DPRK generation after generation.
					
					 Recalling that Kim Jong Il clarified the unique principle of Songun that the army precisely means the party, the state and the people, adopting the Songun politics as a main political mode under socialism, he stressed: Under the outstanding Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il socialist Korea has steadily advanced along the road of victory. 
					
					 Pak Myong San, vice-chairman of the confederation, said in his report delivered on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of liberation of Korea that President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, led the great anti-Japanese war to victory, achieving the liberation of Korea.
					
					Thanks to the wise Songun politics of Kim Jong Il the DPRK has demonstrated its might as a powerful bulwark of peace and progress, which nobody can provoke, he emphasized.

articles.title: 100th Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Cuba
articles.content:
100th Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Cuba
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A Cuban preparatory committee was inaugurated on August 11 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at its inaugural ceremony.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events until the year 2012.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro del difunto Kong Jin Thae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral ante feretro del difunto Kong Jin Thae 
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 19 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Kong Jin Thae, miembro del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y ex vicepremier del Consejo de Administracion, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Visitara pronto Seul el grupo de enviados especiales
articles.content:
Visitara pronto Seul el grupo de enviados especiales
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ATCC) -- Por encargo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el grupo de enviados especiales encabezado por el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam, visitara del dia 21 al 22 Seul para expresar condolencias por el fallecimiento del ex presidente surcoreano Kim Dae Jung.

articles.title: Revelados nuevos detalles de reclutamiento forzado de Japon
articles.content:
Revelados nuevos detalles de reclutamiento forzado de Japon
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ATCC) -- En relacion con que fueron buscados recientemente a los coreanos que habian sido sometidos al trabajo de esclavitud tras ser reclutados y llevados forzadamente al Astillero de Kobe de la Industria Pesada Mitsubishi S.A. de Japon (nombre de aquel entonces), el Comite Coreano por Medidas de Indemnizacion a ex "Consoladoras" para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso hizo publico el dia 20 el informe de investigacion.
					El documento revela, con argumentos confirmados con las declaraciones de las victimas y la investigacion, los crimenes de reclutamiento y trabajo forzosos, que cometieron el viejo gobierno japones y el Astillero de Kobe contra los jovenes y adultos coreanos.
					
					Los escenarios de trabajo forzado en Japon, comprobables por ahora, son mil 550 aproximadamente, comienza el informe y continua:
					
					 Se calcula que los coreanos reclutados para Mitsubishi S.A. sobrepasan los 100 mil, de ellos casi 60 mil en las minas de carbon y minerales y el resto, en otros sectores como la industria pesada.
					
					Entre ellos, mas de 4 mil fueron trasladados al Astillero de Kobe en dos ocasiones desde la provincia de Phyong-an, la de Kyongsang y las otras coreanas.
					
					De mas de 2 mil procedentes de esa primera provincia pudieron regresar a su tierra natal solo cientos de personas que se han salvado a duras penas del brutal trabajo forzado, accidentes de todo tipo, ataque aereo de las tropas yanquis y otros siniestros.
					
					 El reclutamiento de los jovenes y adultos coreanos por parte de los imperialistas japoneses se llevo a cabo combinando varios metodos de coercion fisica y espiritual como el secuestro, el rapto y la imposicion abusando del poder gubernamental y militar, etc.
					
					Los coreanos arrestados y secuestrados se encerraban en los lugares iguales al campo de concentracion y se vieron obligados a trabajar duro por largo tiempo en las condiciones letales y a observar una disciplina que se aplicaba a los esclavos en la edad media.
					
					El gobierno del viejo Japon es el responsable principal de esos crimenes y las empresas japonesas son sus complices por las siguientes razones:
					
					 Primera, los consorcios y otras empresas de Japon de aquel entonces demandaron al gobierno trazar y practicar la politica  de reclutamiento forzoso contra los coreanos.
					
					 Segunda, ellos cometieron la vigilancia, la represion y la discriminacion nacional sobre los jovenes y adultos coreanos llevados a Japon y otros paises.
					
					Tercera, aun despues de la derrota de Japon en la Segunda Guerra Mundial, los consorcios involucrados en esos crimenes no pagan a las victimas y a sus familiares el sueldo no pagado.
					
					 Cuarta, los consorcios japoneses eliminaron quemando u ocultaron las pruebas y los documentos relacionados con el arresto forzado y no toman ninguna medida para buscar los restos mortales de los coreanos victimas de ese crimen, que estan dispersados y abandonados en todas partes de Japon.
					
					 Los crimenes de arresto y trabajo forzosos contra coreanos, perpetrados por el gobierno y el circulo militar del viejo Japon en confabulacion con las empresas, y el consiguiente genocidio de los coreanos son imprescriptibles porque resultan graves violaciones de DDHH que contravienen no solo a la ley internacional sino tambien a la ley nacional de Japon.
					
					El gobierno y los consorcios de Japon deben tener bien presente que no podran liberarse jamas de su responsabilidad por todos los crimenes antieticos cometidos en el pasado contra el pueblo coreano incluyendo los ya mencionados.
					
					Por lo tanto, han de averiguar y publicar todos los aspectos verdaderos de esos crimenes, pedir disculpas e indemnizar cabalmente a los damnificados y sus familiares.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia ejercicio belico EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia ejercicio belico EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ATCC) -- Para ocultar el caracter agresivo y belicista de su ejercicio militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian", Estados Unidos y la camarilla de Lee Myung Bak recurren al sofisma de que es un "entrenamiento para la defensa". 
					Esta maniobra, identica al anterior ejercicio militar conjunto "Ulji Focus Lens" excepto a su nombre, es el tipico ejercicio de ataque preventivo nuclear contra el Norte de Corea. 
					
					Revela el rotativo Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este jueves y continua: 
					
					El inicio de "Ulji Freedom Guardian" por parte de EE.UU. y las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas constituye desafio frontal a la nacion coreana y a los pueblos del mundo amantes de la paz.
					
					Igualmente, comprueba que esta llegando a la fase muy grave la intencion de ocupar a la RPDC mediante la guerra que comenzaria por el ataque sorpresivo y preventivo. 
					
					Ademas, evidencia una vez mas que el "dialogo sincero" y la "cooperacion", de que hablan ellos, no pasan de ser una astuta artimana para enganar a la opinion publica surcoreana y liberarse de la responsabilidad de haber destruido las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					 Pero, es una ilusion nunca realizable el intento de EE.UU. y los compinches de Lee Myung Bak de derrumbar a la RPDC con las fuerzas armadas. 
					
					Responder a la provocacion de los enemigos con la represalia mil veces mas fuerte es el temperamento del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea. 
					
					Si los belicistas internos y externos incurren en cualquier minima provocacion en el cielo, la tierra y el mar, seran sorprendidos por el fuego rotundo e implacable.
